name: Light On The Past
description:
Chinese Version Only

Summary

Light On The Past is a short, story-driven detective puzzle game that follows a P.I (private eye) who can use the magic flashlight to project past space, it can also capture the remaining consciousness fragments of the character in the past space. 

This time the commission is to obtain illegal drugs. The drugs are related to a recent suicide case, so players will go to the crime scene to search using magic flashlights.

Controls:
Movement - W, A, S, D
Interact - LMB
FlashLight - RMB
Time Travel - Mouse Scroll
